title: Zong’s data center achieves TIA-942-C rated-3 certification
content:
ISLAMABAD, Nov 05 (APP):Zong, Pakistan’s leading cellular and digital services provider announced its achievement of the prestigious TIA-942-C Rated-3 Certification for its Data Center located at Zong HQ, Islamabad.
This certification is a testament to Zong’s unwavering commitment to being an excellent information services and technology innovation company in Pakistan.
The announcement was made in an event “Telecom Cyber Security Awards 2024,” organized by Telecommunication Authority (PTA).
The TIA-942 is an internationally recognized standard for Data Center infrastructure, and the Rated-3 certification highlights Zong’s dedication to offering state-of-the-art solutions to its customers. This achievement demonstrates that Zong’s Data Center adheres to strict criteria for system redundancy, uptime, and disaster resilience, reinforcing the company’s position as a leader in the telecommunications industry.
While congratulating the Network team Zong’s Chief Technical Officer  Lu Jianhui said, “Achieving this certification reflects our ongoing investment in the latest technologies and infrastructure. This accomplishment enables us to provide industry-leading data services, minimize downtime, and offer maximum security to our valued customers. Our commitment to maintaining robust Data Center operations makes Zong a preferred choice for businesses seeking secure and reliable Data Center solutions in Pakistan.”
With this certification, Zong has further strengthened its infrastructure to meet the growing demands of its customers, ensuring seamless service delivery and enhanced business continuity.
This achievement is a significant milestone in Zong’s mission to set new standards in digital and telecommunications services, establishing itself as a trusted partner for enterprises in Pakistan.
